sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(i : j = 7 : 3 \), then find \((8 i + 6 j ):(6 i + 2 j )\)
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " $$\text{
 It is given that }$$
\[
 i : j = 7 : 3 
\]
$$\text{We need to find the value of }$$\
\[
 \frac{\input[s1v1]{} i + 6 j }{6 i + \input[s1v2]{} j }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ \frac{8 i }{j } + \input[s2v1]{} }{\frac{\input[s2v2]{} i }{j } + 2 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ 8 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{3 } \right ) + 6 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{7 }{3 } \right) + 2 }}
\]
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\frac{\input[s4v1]{} + 18 }{3 }}{\frac{\input[s4v2]{} + 6 }{3 }}
\]
\[
 = \frac{56 + 18 }{42 + 6 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{24 }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{
 So, the answer is $37 : 24 $.}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [8, 2], "text": " $$ \text{Please refer back to the question.} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [6, 6], "text": " $$ \text{Dividing numerator and denominator by j, we get the expression} \frac{ \frac{8 i }{j } + 6 }{\frac{6 i }{j } + 2 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [7, 6], "text": " $$\text{Substitute the given ratio of i:j = 7:3, to get the expression $\frac{ 8 \left (\frac{7 }{3 } \right ) + 6 }{6 \left(\frac{7 }{3 } ight) + 2 } }$$ 
 "}, {"data": [56, 42], "text": " 
 $$ \text{We take LCM's to get the expression $\frac{\frac{56 + 18 }{3 }}{\frac{42 + 6 }{3 }}$
, after which multiplying both numerator and denomiator by 7 \text{, we get} \frac{56 + 18 }{42 + 6 }} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [37], "text": " 
 $$ \text{ Upon further simplification we get the following answer \frac{37 }{24 }.} $$"}, {"data": [], "text": "
 "}]
